= Introduction =

== Why a student should join caldav4j ==
 * join an opensource crew, meet calendaring community - as caldav4j people is in touch with other caldav server developer, like Bedework and Davical
 * learn how to read and interpret an RFC
 * implement a standard protocol to use in your project
 * caldav is the big issue of next years, as collaboration needs more interoperability
 * learn the protocol and switch to mobile: in the future there will be a needing of caldav mobile clients for android, symbian, windows/outlook & co
 * try test drive development: write test cases, then code..and be sure everything is as expected.

 * wish: WebDAV, [http://www.slideshare.net/ioggstream/presenting-caldav-draft-1-presentation CalDAV], HttpClient, JaCkRabbit, wireshark/ethereal/tcpdump
